events.message: I recently purchased a jacket, but it doesn't fit well. I would like to request a refund or exchange as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to customer mentioning refund and exchange.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Alice for further assistance with the refund request.
Hello, I’m Alice from customer support. I see you want to request a refund or exchange for your jacket. I’m here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the jacket is unused and in original packaging for the refund process?
My order number is 12345678. The jacket is unused and still in its original packaging, ready for return.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process. You will receive a prepaid return label within 24 hours to send the jacket back.
Thanks a lot for the quick help! I appreciate the prepaid label and look forward to a smooth refund.
The refund process has been successfully initiated, and the return label has been sent to your email. Please check and ship the jacket at your earliest convenience.
Just checking in to ensure you have received the return label and to ask if you need any further assistance with your refund.
I received the label and have already shipped the jacket back. Thank you for following up!
We confirm receipt of your returned jacket and have processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
We value your feedback. Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience.
I completed the survey. Overall, I’m very happy with the prompt and helpful support I received during my refund process.
The case has now been formally closed following the successful refund and customer feedback.
